oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: David Allan Coe - Penitentiary Blues outtakes and trims
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of various trims and outtakes from the documentary Penitentiary Blues, featuring David Allan Coe (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: David Allan Coe
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified guitar riff] -- David Allan Coe talks about songwriting and it's therapeutic quality -- Penitentiary Blues (David Allan Coe) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified] introduces Coe and talks about his criminal past -- [break] -- Oh Warden (David Allan Coe) -- [Unidentified] talks about Coe's past and his current musical endeavors -- [break] -- [Unidentified] introduces Coe and talks about comparisons between Coe's past and his current situation -- One Way Ticket To No Where (David Allan Coe) -- [Unidentified] continues talking about Coe's criminal past and current musical success
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Coe, David Allan;
